mherrmann_at wrote:
> What is the overall opinion about Joe Walnes' aproach to flexible
> JUnit assertions using assertThat? Do you think it is better or worse
> than the current assertions? I would like to have it included in the
> new release, would you too? David, why do you think using constraints
> is heavy weight? 
> 

I have been playing with assertThat(). I like it a lot and will continue 
to use it. I will continue to use it whether or not it is part of the 
framework.

I have also been experimenting with using "should" in the names of all 
my tests. I was quite surprised by the positive effect it had on the 
quality of my tests.

I have no strong opinion on the other issues you mention.

Kevin
